attributes.action: Reconsider free Early Learning & Childcare & Private Nursery sector funding.
attributes.background: Nurseries, over the uk offer 600 hours or more to families and while this is fab for children, the private sector is not able to sustain this free care due to the financial outgoings they have to factor in. 1140 hours in 2020 will crucify business. More funding required so we can help to meet demand

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
